dunes-script-module.name: executeTransientRESTOperation
dunes-script-module.description:
Executes a transient RESTOperation for a transient RESTHost. Performs the operation without having the operation nor the host persist in the RESTHost Inventory. Returns the response string and status code as named key-value pairs "responseString" and "statusCode", respectively.
For vRO 7.0+
dunes-script-module.param: Base URL for connecting to the RESTful application
Optional username for Basic authentication to the REST host
Optional password for Basic authentication to the REST host
URL template of the REST operation including variablized in-line arguments; e.g., /items/{arg1}
Optional content type of the request body (null for GET and DELETE operations)
Content of the request body (null for GET and DELETE operations)
